description.label: Description
description.help: Enter the description of the model configuration

code.label: Unique Code
code.help: Automatically generated unique code of the model configuration

apiSecretCode.label: OpenAI token
apiSecretCode.help: Choose the OpenAI token to be used for this model

choosedModel.label: OpenAI chat model choice
choosedModel.help: Choose the OpenAI chat model to work with.

defaultModel.label: set this as default chat model
defaultModel.help: If true this will be used as default chat model where chat model is not indicated

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.help: Temperature the model will respond, from 0 to 1 (if unsure leave empty)

topP.label: TopP
topP.help: TopP parameter, from 0 to 1 (if unsure leave empty)

contextLength.label: Context length (tokens)
contextLength.help: Amount of text an AI model can consider when processing (if not set 128000 will be used)

enabledFunctions.label: Enabled functions call for this model
enabledFunctions.help: Functionalities that could be used by the model during the chat

defaultModelPrompt.label: Default model prompt
defaultModelPrompt.help: Edit the default prompt for the chat model.

modelCode.label: Chat model to use
modelCode.help: Choose the chat model you whant to ask the prompt template generation

query.label: Prompt template request
query.help: Specify in 2nd person wich is the objective that the AI will support the user

response.label: Suggested prompt template
response.help: Generated template text for your objective (you can change or correct/modify it)

code.label: Unique Code
code.help: Automatically generated unique code of the embedding model configuration

description.label: Description
description.help: Enter the description of the embedding model configuration

apiSecretCode.label: OpenAI token
apiSecretCode.help: Choose the OpenAI token to be used for this model

defaultModel.label: set this as default embedding model
defaultModel.help: If true this will be used as default embedding model where embedding model is not indicated

choosedModel.label: OpenAI embedding model choice
choosedModel.help: Choose the OpenAI embedding model to work with.
